name: Mind Robber
description: Mind Robber is a third person stealth heist game. You play as a bank robber with the ability to move objects with his mind. The objective is to break in to the bank vault and make it out with as much loot as possible. To do this you will have to avoid the bank guards, security cameras and the bank’s laser defence system. Ultimately Mind Robber is a game of stealth, once you get detected it’s all over.
